name: Fish Out of Water (alturkabuterimon)
description:
Do you struggle to stay hydrated? As we're often told, drinking water is important to keep our bodies healthy. This short prototype was developed in response to the fact that at least 70% of the UK's population are de-hydrated. 

The game is played with the mouse, you can set a goal for the amount of water you drink and once you complete it a fish is added to your tank (note: this only happens once in the prototype! If you want to see it spawn again you have to close and reopen the game completely) 

You can also feed your fish by clicking the button at the bottom of the screen. 

All art and assets are made by me @ Ashleigh Kennedy 

Background Music is from here: 

https://www.freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Captain_Glouglous_Incredible_Week_... 

Please let me know what you think of this prototype!
